title: New Starter For The Pats? Simmons' Fouling Problem A Concern?
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre and Domonique Foxworth featuring David Jacoby! On today’s show: How do you expect things to play out between Mac Jones, Bailey Zappe, and the Patriots? What do you make of QBs like Matt Ryan, Russell Wilson, Carson Wentz, and Baker Mayfield struggling with their new teams? Are you starting to view the contract situation between Lamar Jackson and the Ravens differently? Is Ben Simmons’ fouling problem a big deal for the Nets? Plus, Adam Silver attempts to discourage tanking in the NBA and Karl-Anthony Towns wants Anthony Edwards to stop eating Popeyes! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Who Will Be The Starter In New England? Ben Simmons' Fouling Problem On Nets
